analyzed: sahajāta vāre pi pe pañhā vāre pi sabbattha eka

original: 3.5.5. Saññojanasaññojanasampayuttaduka, Kusalattika
analyzed: saññojana saññojana sampayutta duka kusala ttika

original: Hetu
analyzed: hetu

original: Saññojanañceva saññojanasampayuttañca akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saññojano ceva saññojanasampayutto ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: saññojanam ca iva saññojana sampayuttañca akusalam dhammam paṭicca saññojanaḥ ca iva saññojana sampayuttaḥ ca akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Saññojanasampayuttañceva no ca saññojanaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saññojanasampayutto ceva no ca saññojano akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: saññojana sampayuttañca iva no ca saññojanam akusalam dhammam paṭicca saññojana sampayuttaḥ ca iva no ca saññojanaḥ akusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Saññojanañceva saññojanasampayuttaṁ akusalañca saññojanasampayuttañceva no ca saññojanaṁ
analyzed: saññojanam ca iva saññojana sampayuttam akusalam ca saññojana sampayuttam ca iva no ca saññojana

original: akusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca saññojano ceva saññojanasampayutto ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: akusalañca dhammam paṭicca saññojanaḥ ca iva saññojana sampayuttaḥ ca akusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe nava adhipatiyā nava pe avigate nava saṅkhitta

original: Nahetuyā tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetuyā tīṇi na adhipatiyā nava na purejāte nava na pacchājāte nava na āsevane nava na kamme tīṇi na vipāke nava na vippayutte nava saṅkhitta

original: (Sahajātavāropi … sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)
analyzed: sahajāta vāraḥ api sampayutta vāraḥ api paṭicca vāra sadisā vitthāretabbā

original: Saññojano ceva saññojanasampayutto ca akusalo dhammo saññojanassa ceva saññojanasampayuttassa ca akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: saññojanaḥ ca iva saññojana sampayuttaḥ ca akusalaḥ dhammaḥ saññojanassa ca iva saññojana sampayuttassa ca akusalassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… upanissaye āsevane nava, kamme āhāre indriye jhāne tīṇi, magge sampayutte nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe nava adhipatiyā nava pe upanissaye āsevane nava kamme āhāre indriye jhāne tīṇi magge sampayutte nava pe avigate nava saṅkhitta

original: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava, naadhipatiyā nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetuyā nava na ārammaṇe nava na adhipatiyā nava

original: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetu paccayāḥ na ārammaṇe tīṇi

original: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetu paccayā ārammaṇe nava saṅkhitta

original: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṁ, evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
analyzed: yathā kusala ttike pañhāvārassa anulomam pi paccanīyam pi anuloma paccanīyam pi paccanīya anulomam pi gaṇitaḥ evam gaṇetabba

original: 3.5.6. Saññojanavippayuttasaññojaniyaduka, Kusalattika
analyzed: kusala ttika

original: Hetu
analyzed: hetu

original: Saññojanavippayuttaṁ saññojaniyaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto saññojaniyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: saññojana vippayuttam saññojaniyam kusalam dhammam paṭicca saññojana vippayuttaḥ saññojaniyaḥ kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Saññojanavippayuttaṁ asaññojaniyaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto asaññojaniyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: saññojana vippayuttam asaññojaniyam kusalam dhammam paṭicca saññojana vippayuttaḥ asaññojaniyaḥ kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā dve ārammaṇe dve pe avigate dve

original: (Yathā cūḷantaraduke lokiyadukasadisaṁ. Sahajātavāropi …pe… pañhāvāropi sabbattha vitthāretabbā.)
analyzed: yathā cūḷantara duke sahajāta vāropi pe pañhā vāropi sabbattha vitthāretabbā

original: Saññojanavippayutto saññojaniyo akusalo dhammo saññojanavippayuttassa saññojaniyassa akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: saññojana vippayuttaḥ saññojaniyaḥ akusalaḥ dhammaḥ saññojana vippayuttassa saññojaniyassa akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ saṅkhitta

original: Ārammaṇe ekaṁ. (Sabbattha ekaṁ, saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: ārammaṇe eka sabbattha eka saṅkhitta

original: Saññojanavippayuttaṁ saññojaniyaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto saññojaniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: saññojana vippayuttam saññojaniyam abyākatam dhammam paṭicca saññojana vippayuttaḥ saññojaniyaḥ abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Saññojanavippayuttaṁ asaññojaniyaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto
analyzed: saññojana vippayuttam asaññojaniyam abyākatam dhammam paṭicca saññojana vippayuttaḥ

original: asaññojaniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Saññojanavippayuttaṁ asaññojaniyaṁ
analyzed: asaññojaniyaḥ abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saññojana vippayuttam asaññojaniya

original: abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto saññojaniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: abyākatam dhammam paṭicca saññojana vippayuttaḥ saññojaniyaḥ abyākataḥ dhammo uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. Saññojanavippayuttaṁ asaññojaniyaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto
analyzed: hetu paccayā saññojana vippayuttam asaññojaniyam abyākatam dhammam paṭicca saññojana vippayuttaḥ

original: saññojaniyo abyākato ca saññojanavippayutto asaññojaniyo abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: saññojaniyaḥ abyākataḥ ca saññojana vippayuttaḥ asaññojaniyaḥ abyākataḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Saññojanavippayuttaṁ saññojaniyaṁ abyākatañca saññojanavippayuttaṁ asaññojaniyaṁ
analyzed: saññojana vippayuttam saññojaniyam abyākatam ca saññojana vippayuttam a saññojaniya

original: abyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto saññojaniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: abyākatañca dhammam paṭicca saññojana vippayuttaḥ saññojaniyaḥ abyākataḥ dhammo uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… āsevane ekaṁ, kamme pañca, vipāke pañca …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve adhipatiyā pañca pe āsevane eka kamme pañca vipāke pañca pe avigate pañca saṅkhitta

original: Nahetuyā ekaṁ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā dve, napurejāte cattāri, napacchājāte
analyzed: na hetuyā eka na ārammaṇe tīṇi na adhipatiyā dve na purejāte cattāri na pacchājāte

original: pañca, naāsevane pañca, nakamme ekaṁ, navipāke ekaṁ, navippayutte dve …pe… novigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: pañca na āsevane pañca na kamme eka na vipāke eka na vippayutte dve pe no vigate tīṇi

original: (Sahajātavāropi …pe… sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā.)
analyzed: sahajāta vāro api pe sampayutta vāro api paṭicca vāra sadisā

original: Saññojanavippayutto saññojaniyo abyākato dhammo saññojanavippayuttassa saññojaniyassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: saññojana vippayuttaḥ saññojaniyaḥ abyākataḥ dhammaḥ saññojana vippayuttassa saññojaniyassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare cattāri …pe… sahajāte
analyzed: hetuyā cattāri ārammaṇe tīṇi adhipatiyā cattāri anantare cattāri pe sahajāte

original: pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte pacchājāte dve,
analyzed: pañca aññamaññe dve nissaye satta upanissaye cattāri purejāte pacchājāte dve

original: āsevane ekaṁ, kamme …pe… magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate
analyzed: āsevane eka kamme pe magge cattāri sampayutte dve vippayutte tīṇi pe avigate

original: satta. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: satta saṅkhitta

original: Nahetuyā satta, naārammaṇe satta. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetuyā satta na ārammaṇe satta saṅkhitta

original: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe cattāri. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetu paccayāḥ na ārammaṇe cattāri

original: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetu paccayā ārammaṇe tīṇi

original: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṁ, evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
analyzed: yathā kusala ttike pañhāvārassa anulomam pi paccanīyam pi anuloma paccanīyam pi paccanīya anulomam pi gaṇitaḥ evam gaṇetabba

original: Saññojanagocchakakusalattikaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ.
analyzed: saññojana gocchaka kusala ttikam niṭṭhita
